Package net.kuujo.copycat.raft

Provides base interfaces for Copycat's implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command<T>
    Raft state commands modify system state.
    Operation<T>
    Base type for Raft state operations.
    Query<T>
    Raft state queries read system state.
    Raft
    Primary interface for interacting with the Raft consensus algorithm.
    RaftError
    Base type for Raft server errors.
    Session
    Provides event-based methods for monitoring Raft sessions and communicating between Raft clients and servers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command.Builder<T extends Command.Builder<T,U,V>,U extends Command<V>,V>
    Base builder for commands.
    Member
    Configuration for connecting to a member of the Raft cluster.
    Member.Builder
    Builds
    Members
    Container for Raft member configurations.
    Members.Builder
    Members builder.
    Operation.Builder<T extends Operation.Builder<T,U,V>,U extends Operation<V>,V>
    Base builder for Raft state operations.
    Query.Builder<T extends Query.Builder<T,U,V>,U extends Query<V>,V>
    Base builder for queries.
    Raft.Builder<T extends Raft.Builder<T,U>,U extends Raft>
    Raft instance builder.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConsistencyLevel
    Constants for specifying Raft Query consistency levels.
    RaftError.Type
    Raft error types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ApplicationException
    User application exception.
    IllegalMemberStateException
    Illegal member state exception.
    InternalException
    Internal exception.
    NoLeaderException
    Not leader exception.
    RaftException
    Base Raft exception.
    ReadException
    Read exception.
    UnknownSessionException
    Unknown session exception.
    WriteException
    Write exception.

Package net.kuujo.copycat.raft Description

Provides base interfaces for Copycat's implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.

The classes and interfaces in this package are shared both by Copycat's Raft client and server implementations.

Author:
Jordan Halterman
